column1: CDC national health experts to resume coronavirus briefings after being sidelined by White House - CNNPolitics

Wearing masks can help reduce the spread of coronavirus, but the practice has led to a new complaint — “maskne,” breakouts caused by wearing a mask for long periods of time. https://thetandd.com/lifestyles/health-med-fit/how-to-prevent-maskne-and-other-face-mask-skin-issues-according-to-dermatologists/article_cb681237-32c0-5d11-90ed-c862d4c8968f.html?utm_campaign=snd-autopilot&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter_TheTandD
